title: #ShortyStories with Viners Chris Melberger & Shan Dodd
desc: From the creators of the? Shorty Awards , join us for an evening of cocktails, social media and stories!?#ShortyStories is a new monthly event series featuring an influencer or content creator who is making a career out of the internet. ? On December 8th at 7pm, come hear the story of Viners  Chris Melberger  &  Shan Dodd .  Hear how they got their start in the digital space, how Vine brought them together and what?s next for these neat dudes. ? Big thank you to Wix for hosting our event this month!
